resources.string: Click on a marker for details!

- Filter from the home page using the top right navigation button 
 - Valid type filters: micro, regional, brewpub, large, planning, bar, contract, proprietor 
 (Note: Filters save unless deleted) 

- Click a cell to see details 

- Long Click a cell to go to map 

- Click map info window to go to brewery website 

- Long click map info window to add this brewery to saved 

- In saved click cell to see website or long click to delete
